title: How to Make a New Bitmoji

steps.title: Open the Bitmoji app.
steps.content: Open the Bitmoji app. It’s the green icon with a white winking chat bubble on the home screen or in the app drawer. This method will delete your current Bitmoji so you can create a new one. It’s not possible to have two Bitmoji avatars connected to one account. If you’re new to Bitmoji, see How to Use Bitmoji .

steps.title: Tap the gear icon.
steps.content: Tap the gear icon. It’s at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Reset Avatar.
steps.content: Tap Reset Avatar . A confirmation message will appear.

steps.title: Tap OK to confirm.
steps.content: Tap OK to confirm. You’ll be redirected to the gender selection screen so you can start anew.

steps.title: Select a gender.
steps.content: Select a gender. You won’t be able to change this later without resetting your account. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select a Bitmoji style.
steps.content: Select a Bitmoji style. Choose a Bitmoji or Bitstrips Style avatar. Here’s the difference between the two: Bitmoji-style is simpler and more cartoonish. Bitstrips-style has more customization options and looks a little bit more realistic.

steps.title: Customize your Bitmoji’s face and hair.
steps.content: Customize your Bitmoji’s face and hair. As you tap through features, the preview of your avatar will update. Tap the arrow at the top-right corner of the screen to continue through options until you reach the “Save and Pick Outfit” screen.

steps.title: Select an outfit.
steps.content: Select an outfit. Tapping an outfit will display a preview of your avatar wearing that outfit.

steps.title: Tap the checkmark at the top-right corner of the screen to save your character.
steps.content: Tap the checkmark at the top-right corner of the screen to save your character. Your new Bitmoji is ready to use.
